CancelCommonMixStream.document: This example shows you how to cancel a stream mix by session ID.
CancelCommonMixStream.title: Canceling a stream mix

CreateCommonMixStream.document: This example shows you how to use a preset stream mix template to mix streams.
CreateCommonMixStream.title: Applying for stream mix — using template 40

CreateCommonMixStream.document: This example shows you how to use a custom layout.
CreateCommonMixStream.title: Applying for stream mix — using custom layout parameters

CreateCommonMixStream.document: This example shows you how to use cropping parameters.
CreateCommonMixStream.title: Applying for stream mix — using cropping parameters

CreateLiveRecord.document: This example shows you how to use this API for scenarios with fixed start time and end time of recording, such as training courses, business events, shows, and performances.
CreateLiveRecord.title: Creating a scheduled recording task

CreateLiveRecord.document: This example shows you how to immediately start to record any frame of a stream in real time. You can specify the `EndTime` of the recording. The recording period is up to 30 minutes.
CreateLiveRecord.title: Creating a real-time recording task

DescribeProvinceIspPlayInfoList.document: This example shows you how to query the district/ISP [mapping table](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/267/34019?from_cn_redirect=1).
DescribeProvinceIspPlayInfoList.title: Sample request

DescribeUploadStreamNums.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: live.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeUploadStreamNums
<Common request parameters>

{"StartTime":"2020-10-12 00:00:00","EndTime":"2020-10-12 01:01:05","Granularity":5,"Domains":["test.com"]}

DropLiveStream.document: This example shows you how to pause the stream pushed by a host.
DropLiveStream.title: Sample request
